alert.note: Alert for Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 5:43AM AKST until December 26 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TODAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility occuring. Total snow accumulations of one inch. South winds gusting to 40 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...Until noon AKST today. * IMPACTS...Plan for difficult travel conditions. Visibility will be one half mile or less at times. Snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong south winds are causing blowing snow with low visibility. The worst conditions are in the Bering Strait. Winds are expected to decrease this afternoon and visibility is expected to improve then.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
